fields.name: Black Myth: Wukong
fields.description:
Black Myth: Wukong is an action role-playing game with Soulslike elements. It is a single-player game, which is played from a third-person perspective.

The player controls a monkey protagonist referred to as the Destined One, who is based on Sun Wukong from the Journey to the West. The protagonist's weapon is a staff, which is based on the Ruyi Jingu Bang from the novel. The staff can extend and shrink in size during combat.[9] The three staff stances, which are the smash stance, the pillar stance, and the thrust stance, provide versatility in fights. The combat mechanics involve resource management. Focus can be accumulated by landing light attacks, executing well-timed dodges, and other means. A focus point is gained when the meter for focus is filled up. These points can be used to initiate heavy attacks.A heavy attack can be executed on its own or as a varied combo, which is triggered during light attacks.Stamina is depleted by sprinting, dodging, and attacking.[18][19]

Spells have cooldowns and consume mana.They are categorized in mysticism, alteration, strand, and transformations.[20] The protagonist uses transformations to shapeshift into a different creature or being.[21][9] An example is the transformation Red Tides, which takes the form of Guangzhi, a wolfman who wields a flaming glaive.[9] The transformations come with their own movesets and health.[21][9] They are available on cooldown, but do not cost mana. They last until their might, which is depleted by attacking, or health runs out.

Spirits provide a skill and passive effect if they are equipped. Defeated yaoguai chiefs may leave behind their spirits, which can be acquired if they are absorbed into a gourd. Spirit skills function as transformations to do a unique attack. Qi is used to activate spirit skills. An example of a spirit is the Wandering Wight, who does a headbutt attack.

The game follows a mostly linear progression interspersed with expansive areas. Throughout the world, the protagonist encounters various yaoguai as enemies.There are keeper's shrines, which act as checkpoints for the player, along the way. Players can reallocate their character's sparks, which are skill points, to change the character's playstyle without any restrictions. The game's difficulty cannot be changed by players, but it does not remain the same throughout a playthrough.

fields.name: Baldurs Gate 3
fields.description:
Baldur's Gate 3 is the next installment in the beloved saga, which was officially unveiled at the Google Stadia event. The developers were people who had previously worked on the Divinity series. We invite users to see for themselves the spectacle of the upcoming game by enjoying the teaser trailer, which tells about the main features. It will be possible to download Baldur's Gate 3 torrent after the official release of the part.

So far, there is not enough information about the project. Neither the release date nor the features of the engine or the combat system have been reliably determined. So far, the developers promise that in this part a cooperative mode will reappear, built on the principle of a similar one in Divinity: Original Sin 2.

The developer Larian Studios has published information in its official press release that the third part of the game will expand the edges of the RPG genre. The user will be offered an interesting plot with tangible freedom of the player during decision-making, and some of them imply risk and high costs.

fields.name: No Man's Sky
fields.description:
Do you want something incredible? Something large-scale? Then the game No Man's Sky download torrent is right for you. This is a sci-fi project, the developer was the British studio Hello Games, best known for its Joe Danger series about a funny stunt. But No Man's Sky is something completely different, or higher.

Yes, it is. At the same time, both literally and figuratively. The game world is procedurally generated. At the same time, the world is not a separate country, planet or even system. It's a whole universe! Each celestial body is unique and inimitable. Each planet has its own ecosystem. The life forms are amazing. How do you, for example, with a high-rise building carnivorous worms?

Who do we play?

The player acts as a scout, traveler. He has his own ship, which needs to be groomed and cherished, otherwise after its destruction he will have to hang out at an unknown point in space in an escape pod. And they can destroy the ship - the inhabitants of space are allowed to fight with each other

fields.name: Final Fantàsy 16 (XVI)
fields.description: The cult fantasy universe is once again ready to please with unique adventures that will allow you to achieve new impressions and get acquainted with the updated narrative. This time, the developers have decided to touch upon a completely new topic about the game and its environment, or to be more precise, you will find a dark fantasy that will tell the amazing story of a knight who has become the last hope for the salvation of mankind. And what was his surprise that along with evil would come a new misfortune - the Eidolns, who possess children. The situation is not the most pleasant, to put it mildly, but there is nowhere to go, you have to act and try to survive in the new conditions of this adventure.

fields.name: Wolcen Lords of Mayhem
CyberPunk 2077
Elden Ring
fields.description:
Finally happening, two of the most hardcore and violent directions unite and invite users to go on an exciting adventure that will make you believe that evil can really be strong. By the way, today's game, which we highly recommend you to play, was created by the efforts of great developers (authors of Dark Souls) and no less great writer George R.R. Martin. Together they managed to create something unusual, dark and merciless. You already have the opportunity to download Elden Ring via torrent in Russian and become a hero who has to go on an adventure and overthrow evil. The problem is that there is only one hero, and evil is everywhere.

As before, Elden Ring is a role-playing adventure full of not only beautiful graphics, but also an incredibly high level of difficulty. A fantasy world that is on the verge of total destruction awaits you again. Evil is already dominating everywhere, so you will have to act carefully and try

fields.name: Darkest Dungeon 2 (II)
fields.description:
Dark universes often become the object of close attention from users who enjoy spending a lot of time. For example, the most beloved universe of our time is the game Darkest Dungeon, which has received recognition and is simply a successful game. The developers from Red Hook Studios did not torment fans and released the first teaser for the sequel. Yes, after several updates to the first part, users will have the opportunity to go to a completely new world with the usual style and characters. And if you are ready to go to this world, then you just have to wait for the release and download Darkest Dungeon 2.

A new location for dark heroism
The new adventure promises to be unpredictable and interesting, as the events will unfold in a mountain range with a small town. The developers promise an expanded setting, which will not only be mysterious, but also incredibly difficult.

fields.name: Liberator TD
fields.description:
Liberator TD is both turret defense and a "Top Down Shooter", and is complemented by a pinch of science fiction! Where you have to colonize a distant world, but it turns out that hostile creatures already live there...

Game Overview
Hurry up and take up arms and build an effective defense to fight off hordes of enemies and at the same time reveal all the secrets of the planet. Shoot and destroy as many insects as you can! But beware of especially large individuals, as well as powerful bosses and mini-bosses.

As it turns out, you've arrived to colonize an already densely populated world – and it won't end well. And literally! What does the onboard AI not talk about? Explore the planet inside and out to find out if you are really the only person here or not. Start your adventures in 3,2,1...

Game Overview

Therefore, it turned out to be a completely new action format! Well, here you can assemble a unique and sufficiently maneuverable robot to then move through a beautiful three-dimensional space.

There are few survivors left in it, and even then, they are forced to survive separately, since there is no trust in anyone. Taking on the role of one of the survivors, you will have to take advantage of all available options for self-development and creating conditions for life. You will have to fight zombies in any case, but this will not be the basis of survival. After all, the main points for life will be resources, food, shelter and weapons. And if you are ready to go on an adventure, then all you have to do is download the HumanitZ torrent on PC and you can start surviving.

Complete freedom of action

The undeniable advantage of the adventure will be complete freedom of survival. You are free to do whatever you want- No one prevents you from going to the city center and starting to collect the resources you find. Just keep in mind that you will have to face a large number of dangerous

fields.description:
INCISION – try to go as far as possible through rather creepy labyrinths made in an industrial style, altered cityscapes and unusual alien buildings. Plunge headlong into quite brutal and at the same time dynamic battles, and also try to come out of them as a winner!

Game plot
Brutal, fast, and based on old classic shooters, the game will definitely make you enjoy the story! Get a truly unique experience, apply your focus and, of course, you can expect to be rewarded for your efforts. Well, all you need to do here is cut, shoot, burn and simply destroy everything in your path.

In addition, you will be able to use 8 types of a wide variety of weapons (shotguns, heavy machine guns, revolvers, incendiary rockets, saw spears) and much more. And, the world itself now looks more like a nightmare in which flesh and machines were able to combine in the most terrible way.

fields.name: Ghost runner 2
fields.description:
Ghostrunner 2 is a cyberpunk adventure parkour action game that puts you in the shoes of a professional mercenary on a quest to take down the big evil corporations. In that interactive world, people have already ceased to be themselves, using a variety of implants and technologies implanted into their bodies. As a result of such interaction, people have lost themselves and become unrecognizable, succumbing to aggression or submitting to a higher force. That is why the main character decides to thwart plans for the general zombification of people by destroying the production and programming of implants by corporations. And if you can't wait to dive into this adventure, all you need to do is download the Ghostrunner 2 torrent on PC and you're ready to go.

Dynamic confrontation

The main advantage of the adventure has remained unchanged - dynamic movement using parkour elements and spectacular battles using a katana. This segment of the game has become many times better and offers much more features.

fields.name: Into the Necrovale
fields.description:
Into the Necrovale – In this role-playing game, you need to collect various powerful items that can be combined with each other. At the same time, skillfully use your own physique. Unless, of course, you want to uncover the secrets and dangers of Necrodol, a place that has become home to various villains and criminals.

Game Overview
Stranger, your fate hangs in the balance, or an ordinary condemned criminal chosen by the All-Father himself. But to keep everything as it is or to destroy it to the ground? The decision is up to you.

Someone can succumb to hopelessness, others are lost, there are still drowned and forgotten by everyone. No matter! You still need to fight for survival. Simply put, the dark Necrodol has become a haven for generations of unwanted criminals. Well, you go to download Into the Necrovale via torrent on PC to go there.

fields.name: Chains of Fury
fields.description:
"It's time for retribution!" - with these words begins the main storyline of the game Chains of Fury, which is ideal for all those who have been working hard all week, are terribly tired and are ready to take out all their anger and negative energy on virtual monsters! Smashing, breaking, exploding, and destroying can all be done in a variety of ways in Chains of Fury.

And very sophisticated, because according to the plot, you are a very experienced private mercenary who has nothing sacred, and who only needs his money. You're a legend, a kind of superhero among cold-blooded assassins, which is why your enemies made a big mistake when they crossed your path.

You were hired to remove the main, very powerful person with connections. You've done a great job, but now that the king is dead, no one is going to pay you for a brilliant job. Moreover, there is a solution to simply remove you, to waste you, because you know too much. Unfair, right?

fields.name: Enotria The Last Song
fields.description:
Souls-Like is an exciting role-playing game set in a fantasy world favored by many gamers. The style chosen by the developers reflects elements of Italian folklore and culture. There is a similarity with Souls-Like here. However, there is an important feature - the game world is distinguished by brighter colors, characteristic of the Italian summer.

Playing field
While traveling through the game's large map, users encounter many dangers. During the passage, you will have to overcome many difficulties. The continent on which the game takes place is called Enotria. There is no need to relax here. Dangers await at every step. The bright, colorful world beckons you to hit the road. Moving deep into the fantasy world, you can improve your character, make him more agile and brave.

Plot
The world of fantasy captivates from the first minutes. The character is immersed in fascinating worlds.

fields.name: Atelier Ryza 3
fields.description:
Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key is the sequel to the classic JRPG game that belongs to the Secret series. The first part was released in 2019 and the second in 2021. Immerse yourself in the final adventure of Riza and her companions, and just have a good time.

Game plot
Thanks to the "keys", this adventure becomes even more convenient and exciting! You can create special items by synthesizing all kinds of keys or even strengthen your characters to fight against quite powerful monsters later. In addition, keys can open access to barriers and chests with real treasures. This way, you'll be able to find rare items as you explore all kinds of fields.

Plus, your adventure starts after mysterious islands appear. Riza lives a normal life with her friends somewhere on an island called Kurken, but then the urgent news arrives.

fields.name: Wild West Dynasty
fields.description:
Wild West Dynasty is a great adventure that will allow you to immerse yourself in an open world, during the era of the Wild West.

Sharpshooters and cowboys

The main action takes place in the 1800s in America, where residents move inland each time in order to find a better life and establish new settlements. Rumors of gold attracted hundreds of brave travelers, while the small village began to rapidly turn into a city, with gambling, adventurers and merchants. In this adventure, players will take on the role of a brave cowboy who is trying to build his own ranch, providing it with wealth and food. We invite you to download Wild West Dynasty torrent on PC and create your own dynasty.

The long and thorny path of a lonely cowboy

You will have to collect food, hunt animals, sell hide and meat. It will be necessary to build a city with ordinary hotels, offices for sheriffs, saloons and various shops.

fields.name: ASKA
fields.description:
ASKA – build your own Viking settlement and survive in some pretty difficult conditions! Embark on an amazing voyage through the turbulent seas and unravel the secrets of this extraordinary world. Survive, build various objects, fight, swim and do much more, but be sure that an ancient enemy will come after you...

Game Description
In this highly developed game, you will create your own Viking tribe, work hard, craft, hunt, fight and all this together! Therefore, quickly take command and organize the life of the settlers.

In addition, the game's plot is presented from a 3rd person perspective, where you have to satisfy the different needs of the inhabitants. So, for example, build various houses, workshops, shipyards, farms, and more. But before that, don't forget to download ASKA via torrent on PC. Can you handle it?

fields.name: Neckbreak
fields.description:
Neckbreak – if you experience an overdose of reality, it can have sad consequences! Therefore, hurry up and go down the rabbit hole and open a fall with multiple endings. And all this is seasoned with non-linear gameplay, common sense and more.

Game Description
The world is about to end, the EU is in turmoil, and an entirely new superpower is emerging on the horizon. The Novorossiysk Federation includes such members as: Ukraine, Lithuania and Poland. Enter the first European metropolis as soon as possible.

A free town called Crimson Tide is subject to the New World Order. It was erected as the peak of people's achievements on the border between the two powers. Political parties have remained somewhere in the distant past, and voting now takes place through the wallet. Somewhere in the city, an ordinary average citizen begins his next day...

fields.name: Broken Sword - Shadow of the Templars: Reforged
fields.description:
Broken Sword - Shadow of the Templars: Reforged is the same and award-winning adventure. But it has been completely redesigned! For example, the developers have added improved 4K graphics, updated sound and much more.

Game Overview
Embark on an incredible adventure with a fearless American and journalist. Find dangerous adventures for yourself there and uncover amazing ancient conspiracies. But that's not all!

fields.name: Way of the Hunter
fields.description:
Way of the Hunter is an animal hunter simulator where you have to demonstrate all your shooting and game tracking skills. This time you will have the opportunity to go to a colorful and surprisingly spacious corner of the planet, where many different animals live. Do not rush too much to catch them, as the hunt will be as realistic as possible and will require full dedication from you. To test and start applying all your skills, first we want to offer to download the Way of the Hunter torrent on PC and only after that you can start taking the first steps.

Detailed hunting

With the new advantage of your adventure will be the hunt itself, which will be worked out in detail and will allow you to have a good time. Hunting includes dozens of different elements and points for careful study. For example, before shooting, you will have to take into account dozens of different factors, and even get to the victim.

fields.name: Hit of Chernobyl
fields.description:
Hit of Chernobyl is an incredible Survival FPS in which you are invited to explore the Exclusion Zone filled with danger. The gameplay unfolds after a disaster, and now you have to survive in a completely new reality!

Game plot
Years have passed since the tragedy and more and more adventurers are flocking to the abandoned zone: looters, journalists and the most ordinary connoisseurs of thrills. All of them strive to find original artifacts with a variety of properties, but many will have to face unpredictable dangers.

Turn into such an adventurer and explore a bizarre world with authentic and carefully designed locations. From gloomy abandoned factories to strange forests. The gameplay is accompanied by a unique atmosphere of despair and despondency, thanks to which it immerses you in the difficult realities of existence in the Zone. Ready?

fields.name: Jesus Christ Simulator
fields.description:
Jesus Christ Simulator is a completely revolutionary vision of "Superhero Simulator"! Where you can transform into an epic role that has been specially reimagined with modernity in mind.

Game plot
Simply put, in this original game, you are invited to become one of the greatest superheroes. So you will have divine powers, and one mission to fix a broken system in a rather huge metropolis of America.

You must restore order to the past and restore light to the world while people are forced to coexist with systemic gaps and social injustices. To do so, you'll have the ability to fly, have powerful lasers, and a whole host of other abilities. Therefore, help people and radically influence their lives!

fields.name: Water Delivery
fields.description:
Water Delivery is a truly nightmarish 1st person experience. Where you have to turn into a boy working as a water delivery man. He drives a truck to deliver water to his customers. Among his responsibilities: delivering jugs, collecting empty ones and, of course, receiving payment. Will you be able to complete the last evening route?

Game Description
Immerse yourself in the exploration of a variety of original places. At the same time, complete your last task related to delivery in the evening. All jugs of water must be delivered on time.

Find empty jugs, and don't forget to pay. But what can you expect around the next corner? No one knows! What is really the dark secret in this rural community? Do your best to figure it out!

fields.name: HYPER VIOLENT
fields.description:
HYPERVIOLENT is a classic first-person shooter that invites you to go on an exciting adventure and try to achieve success using all the available features. The most interesting and exciting example of your adventure will be that you can easily use a large arsenal of weapons to destroy everything around you. The main thing is to quickly adapt to the situation and make decisions confidently. By the way, the events of the game will take place in the vastness of space, where miners were able to find something terrible and scary on one asteroid. And this something began to kill everyone, sparing no one. You need to urgently go there and try to save the survivors, and for this it will be enough to download the HYPERVIOLENT torrent on PC and start conquering all the available expanses.

Fight or die

To survive in this environment, you will need to put in a lot of effort and try to properly use absolutely all available types of weapons

fields.name: Dusk
fields.description: Dusk is a survival game where players will find themselves in a virtual world that has survived a terrible biological disaster. And now, in conditions of complete loneliness, you have to survive, look for food, equipment and weapons. The game will have a dual mode, that is, the player will have time during the day to explore the world around him and look for the necessary items. And at night, terrible creatures will appear on the streets of the city, ready to tear anyone to pieces. Although, the developer promises that the player will have complete freedom of action, he can act according to the plan, or he can even walk around at night, fighting monsters. But it is worth noting that the monsters will have unique AI, use the environment and predict the player's actions. And the player, in turn, will be able to use parkour skills and build defensive structures and houses.

fields.name: Panic In The Woods
fields.description:
Panic In The Woods is a single-player or cooperative survival horror where you and your friends will have to work together with walkie-talkies in your hands. And all this in the role of real boy scouts, who, by chance, got lost in the middle of a terrible forest!

Game plot
Somewhere in the woods, a nightmarish monster is roaming, and you must expel it from here as soon as possible! Therefore, carefully explore the environment, find all the keys and open the gates that serve as portals to the hellish worlds. In the latter, you will need to get skulls in order to then perform one demonic ritual...

Immerse yourself in survival with close or complete strangers. Try to deceive the monster! Direct your teammates to important places on the radio, use one as bait while the others explore the world around them. And if someone from your team is caught, he will end up in a cage, and others will have to free him. Ready for the consequences?

fields.name: Sker Ritual
fields.description:
Sker Ritual is a first-person shooter that invites you to take advantage of the opportunity to fight dangerous and creepy creatures. This time, you will need to put in a lot of effort and try to achieve a favorable result in terms of survival. It will be enough just to download the game Sker Ritual via torrent to get access to a wide variety of weapons and try to use their characteristics correctly. There will be a lot of monsters, and they will definitely make you make every effort to destroy all enemies and try to properly realize your potential.

Fierce confrontation

The main advantage of the adventure will be the high dynamics of the confrontation, which will allow you to assess your capabilities. You will have to participate in battles either alone or as part of a group of four people. It will be necessary to actively use any available opportunities to realize your potential, do not forget to shoot accurately and dodge enemy attacks.

fields.name: Hollowbody
fields.description:
Hollowbody is a small but terrifying adventure complete with classic survival elements! Immerse yourself in an unusual abandoned town somewhere in the middle of Britain, made in the style of techno-noir.

Game plot
The main character is stuck in a real exclusion zone! There is complete death around, a lot of decomposing corpses, suffocating walls and many other no less gloomy details. In addition, you will be alone with this problem and you have a limited amount of resources at your disposal. Solve the puzzles of the world around you, manage your resources and try to survive in order to leave this place.

fields.name: Green Hell
fields.description:
Green Hell is an ambitious survival simulator that this time offers to go on an amazing adventure and try to survive. However, unlike other similar projects, this time you really have to show special survival skills and try to prove your iron will. There is no doubt that you will gradually adapt to the new conditions, but will it become easier? If you are not afraid of such an unusual beginning of the story, then we suggest just Green Hell download torrent and prove that you are a true professional of survival games. But do not rush, this time everything will be much more difficult, since resources will be running out, and you will have to act based on personal logic and capabilities.

The "green hell" of the Amazon
The story of the game tells about a not very successful traveler who was surrounded by the Amazon. What happened to him? Why was he there all alone? And how can he get out now? It will not be possible to answer these questions just like that, you will have to gradually investigate

fields.name: Magret & Face De Bouc
fields.description:
Magret & FaceDeBouc The buddy-buddy case – you will have a very unusual duet at your disposal. A duck refined in everything and an extremely hostile goat! Help them solve the mystery of the murder of a local store owner. Moreover, the latter was found in the form of a sausage in this incredible cartoon investigation with police officers and point-and-click elements.

Game Overview
Immerse yourself in an incredible episode of a series of point-and-click adventure games. Where you will definitely not be bored! Simply put, open the door to an amazing cartoon universe spiced up with a lot of humor.

Inspector Magre is forced to team up with another inspector to investigate a rather difficult case. In general, this is a game made in the best traditions of the adventure genre, "point and click", and also seasoned with a pinch of nostalgia.

fields.name: Techno baby lon
fields.description:
Technobabylon is an adventure game set in a fairly dynamic universe. Where you have to face various challenges and just enjoy the gameplay.

Go to explore a futuristic world and go through a very interesting plot with a lot of unexpected twists. Here you and the hero will have to travel to the distant future, which is no longer the way you are used to seeing it. And, from the very first minutes, this atmospheric game will make you get only positive emotions and just have a good time.

Where in the distant future you will find a lot of changes, mainly in terms of technological development. However, at one point, its development is paused, and it is something completely informative. Now, in order to get any information on the Internet, you do not need gadgets or computers.

fields.name: Resonance
fields.description:
Resonance is a game with simple adventure graphics and point-and-click elements. Here you have to plunge into the world of science fiction and try to find a repository with the secrets of a deceased scientist.

Gameplay
The brilliant physicist had been working on some secret developments for decades. And at the final stage, he dies under mysterious circumstances. Now the real hunt for his work begins. You need to conquer time itself to get to the secrets of the doctor's research.

Move through the detailed locations, study them carefully, find clues and useful materials. Keep an eye on suspects and gather evidence against them. Selected items can be combined and new attachments can be obtained to aid in your investigation.

fields.name: Old Skies
fields.description:
Old Skies is an unusual adventure in the quest genre. This time, you will have to try on the role of an employee of the technology company ChronoZen named Fia Quinn. The main task of the adventure will be that now you have to assess the entire situation and try to achieve an excellent result in the mission of observing an extremely rich and ambitious family. The only question is that they are going to travel in time and are not particularly worried about the consequences. Therefore, you just have to go with them, prevent any "profit" or attempts to darken the future. To do this, it will be enough for you to download the Old Skies torrent on PC so that nothing else distracts you and you can immerse yourself in this unique narrative.

Importance of the decisions taken

If you like a variety of adventures, then this time you will find an interesting narrative with a lot of interesting discoveries. It will be necessary to monitor each family member and evaluate behavior. If you suddenly

fields.name: Beautiful Desolation Deluxe Edition
fields.description:
Do you remember the wonderful adventure called Stasis, which touched the soul and told about the saddest dark events in space? Now the developers from The Brotherhood studio are going to tell us a new story, the events of which will take place in the distant future in an African setting. The main character of the game will get there completely by accident and will become the epicenter of not the best development of the story. So far, this is all that is known about this project, in the near future the studio itself intends to create a crowdfunding campaign to raise funds and is confident in its success. In principle, after the first masterpiece about space, there is no reason not to trust the company.

As for the appearance, the Beautiful Desolation project will be as isometric as Stasis, and all control will be reduced to point and click format.

fields.name: Who's Lila?
fields.description:
Who's Lila? is an incredible point-and-click adventure game in which you have complete control over the protagonist's facial expressions. The protagonist's life has always been quite difficult, but today is a special day. A girl from his circle of acquaintances disappears and only he was the last to communicate with her.

Game plot
Secretive lifestyle or show true emotions? It's up to you! After all, in fact, the game features a special neural network that recognizes faces. Well, in between the main adventures, you can simply enjoy an unusual world.

It is here that you can find excellent landscapes in the style of abstractionism, surreal architecture, loft interiors, various industrial and everyday objects, and much more. Will you be able to solve all the riddles?

fields.name: The Night of the Rabbit
fields.description:
The Night of the Rabbit is an adventure game with point-and-click gameplay. Events unfold in a grotex-fantasy world, where most of the time the hero will have to explore locations, collect various items, conduct dialogues with the local population and solve many problems.

There is a lot of magic in the game, which the protagonist, named Jerry, learns during his development. He learns new spells that help him achieve the desired goal. One of his most important skills is talking to inanimate objects, such as statues. From them, he can learn a lot of useful things about certain events that they have witnessed.

During the game, we learn the story of a twelve-year-old boy who dreamed of learning the art of magic. At the end of his summer vacation, the hero meets the Marquis de Hoteau, who turns out to be a magician and kindly agrees to take Jerry as an apprentice. But this is not a simple magician, but a hominid rabbit, only the size of an adult human. Marquis pro

fields.name: Tormentum: Dark Sorrow
fields.description:
Tormentum Dark Sorrow is a classic type of adventure in which you have to explore locations, communicate with various characters and, of course, solve interesting puzzles. But, in order to pass them, you will need to use the found items and drive different cars.

Here you will play as an unnamed hero and together with him go on a journey through an incredible world. He has no idea what his name is, and how he got to this strange place. The only thing that the hero has is a picture of a hill, and on its top there is a rather unusual sculpture of a forest, which was made from huge human hands.

fields.name: Stolen Realm
fields.description:
Stolen Realm is an RPG that uses a unique turn-based way of combat. Take control of six of the strongest heroes and embark on an exciting adventure.

Gameplay
Complete tasks and earn money on procedurally generated hexagonal fields. Experience the uniqueness of the combat system and the poignancy of the original RPG story. Carefully plan the placement of each warrior to gain an advantage during the fight. Make the most of the terrain to protect yourself from dangers.

Explore a colorful world and collect hundreds of powerful items and relics. Equip your fighters in the best armor and pick up the strongest weapons for them. During the game, each warrior will receive experience points, which can later be exchanged for improvements. Level up, choose the skills that suit the fighter's class, mix them and create the strongest combinations.

fields.name: Learning Factory
fields.description:
Learning Factory is a unique game that immerses you in the world of automation and exploration of feline happiness. As a chief engineer at an abandoned Factory on Mars, you embark on an exciting journey to create happy cats through science and technology.

Game Description
Start by renovating the Factory, bring it to life with automated production chains. Your task is not only to create products for cats, but also to get to the heart of their happiness through data collection and analysis using machine learning. The more you produce and sell, the more data you get for scientific research.

Every step, every decision leads to a scientific breakthrough that unlocks the secrets of the cat's mind. And don't forget about the Monument and CATopia - they will become symbols of your success and proof of your influence on Mars. Click download Learning Factory via torrent on PC, and get ready for an exciting immersion in the world of science, automation and the happiest cats on the planet!

fields.name: Terminus: Zombie Survivors

fields.name: Counter Strike 1.6
fields.description:
Counter-Strike 1.6 (CT 1.6) is a legendary series of multiplayer 1st person shooters, which celebrated its 15th anniversary in 2015. Such a respectable age for a computer game does not affect the popularity of this project, which has united more than one generation in front of the screens. Perhaps the most popular representative of the series is Counter Strike 1.6, including in the field of esports.

The essence of the project is that two teams of gamers confront each other, performing certain tasks. The first team is terrorists. Their tasks include taking hostages, mining facilities, killing a very important person (VIP) and destroying opponents. The second team is the fighters of counter-terrorist units. Their tasks are opposite: rescuing hostages, defusing a bomb, escorting and saving the lives of VIPs and... This is where the goals coincide.

fields.title: Worse game ever
fields.content: Worse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game everWorse game ever

fields.title: This game surpassed all my expectations.
fields.content: This game surpassed all my expectations. The attention to detail is immaculate, from the intricacies of the storyline to the depth of the characters. Every moment felt purposeful, and I found myself completely immersed for hours on end. The visuals are stunning, and the sound design complements the experience perfectly. It’s rare to find a game that keeps you engaged throughout, but this one does just that."

fields.title: Realy bad
fields.content: This game had so much potential, but it falls flat in almost every aspect. The pacing is awkward, the story is disjointed, and the characters are forgettable. The controls are far from intuitive, and I often found myself frustrated rather than engaged. There’s no replay value, and I regret spending my time on it.

fields.title: Stupid game
fields.content: "I don't understand the hype around this game. The mechanics are clunky, the story feels rushed, and the characters are one-dimensional. I spent more time frustrated with the controls than enjoying the experience. The world feels bland and uninspired, and overall, it’s a huge disappointment."

fields.title: Best of the best
fields.content: "I didn't expect to get hooked as fast as I did. The mechanics are smooth, the challenges are just the right amount of difficult, and the world is one you never want to leave. I found myself coming back day after day, eager to discover what happens next. It's the perfect blend of story and gameplay, making it an unforgettable experience."

fields.title: Not so bad
fields.content: "A mesmerizing experience from start to finish. The developers clearly poured their hearts into every aspect of the game. The blend of atmosphere, gameplay, and narrative is near perfect. I was constantly in awe of the world I was exploring and the characters I encountered. It’s a game that sticks with you long after you’ve put the controller down."
